(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Women’s Lounge Pants

Casual Pants for Women

UEU is a young leisure sports clothing brand, which to help women to be healthy, full of wisdom and confident in contemporary society. Customer comes the first is our believe.UEU is always devoted to become one of the biggest international women’s casual apparel brand on Amazon.Simple, natural and comfy. All Back to Basic!

How did we get our start?

UEU has been devoted to the field of fashion, but simple sports clothes since 2017.

What makes our products unique?

During production period, each the manufacture process have to be put to the highest standards tests, including apparel technology, fabric softness, elastic, color fastness, chemical smell, ect. We ensure each pcs clothing are qualified before packaged.

Why do we love what we do?

Our team are all passionate, dedicated, hardworking and professional. We hope our customer enjoy life, stay healthy, be happy and confidence, love and be loved every moment.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.34 x 9.69 x 1.81 inches; 12.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ IU02207pants6
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 21, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B551M3W8

Imported
Drawstring closure
Machine Wash
US Size: S(4-6), M(8-10), L(12-14), XL(16-18),XXL(20-22). Model is wearing a size Small, height is 5’8″. If you are in between size, please select size down.Inseam: 28-29 inch
HIGH QUALITY: 90% Polyester, 10% Spandex ，Lightweight, Stretchy, Squat Proof, Buttery Soft, High Waited.
DESIGN: Elastic & high-rise waistband with drawstring for a flexible fit, wide leg design provides a relaxed fit at any time, offers an comfy wear, Full Length,while deep side pockets give you somewhere to keep a hankie or hair elastic.

UEU 2022 NEW WOMEN’S PANTS

ENJOY CASUAL PILATES&YOGA


DETAILS OF WIDE LEG & HIGH WAISTED PANTS

SUPER SOFT & STRETCHY MATERIAL

SIZE REFERENCE FOR THESE COMFY PANTS

OCCASIONS FOR WOMEN’S COZY SWEATPANTS
